desc.en: This page lists all the events of Blue Archive.
desc.jp: This page lists all the events of Blue Archive.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有蔚蓝档案的活动。

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.zh_cn:
绝对存在自律分析系统「十字神名」究竟是什么？
为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.zh_cn:
绝对存在自律分析系统「十字神名」究竟是什么？
为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.jp:
The Idol of Momoyodou invites Sensei to Hyakkiyako's Cherry Blossom Festival!
But trouble arises when the streets are overrun by delinquents and...a ninja?!
Brace yourself as the uproarious fun begins!
desc.zh_cn:
因为接到了传统吃茶店「百夜堂」的看板娘突然打来的电话，
老师决定前往{sn百鬼夜行}联合学园的祭典「百夜之春樱花祭」！
但是神秘的问题儿童们和忍者女孩却正在那里作乱！？
狂乱的祭典骚动，即将开始！

desc.en: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.jp: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.zh_cn:
{cf洁莉诺}邀请老师来{sn赤冬}联邦学园迎接「伊凡．库帕拉」夏季庆典。
但是，由于突如其来的政变，{cf洁莉诺}下台了……
为了夺回会长的宝座，{cf洁莉诺}的革命开始了！

desc.en: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.jp: Cherino invites Sensei to Red Winter Academy for the Ivan Kupala Festival. However, Cherino is overthrown in a sudden coup... Thus begins Cherino's revolution to reclaim the presidency!
desc.zh_cn:
{cf洁莉诺}邀请老师来{sn赤冬}联邦学园迎接「伊凡．库帕拉」夏季庆典。
但是，由于突如其来的政变，{cf洁莉诺}下台了……
为了夺回会长的宝座，{cf洁莉诺}的革命开始了！

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.jp:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!

为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.jp: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.zh_cn: {cn梅花园}的教官{cf旬}，喝了从{cf沙耶}那里得到的「回春秘药」，回到了小时候的样子！随着身体的变化，心也变年幼的她，在{sn山海经}的各处引起了各种麻烦……！？

desc.en: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.jp: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.

name.zh_cn: 初音{cf未来}的特别现场会

desc.en:
The virtual idol Hatsune Miku has arrived in Kivotos!
See her like never before with a special new song! Come and show your support!
desc.jp:
The virtual idol Hatsune Miku has arrived in Kivotos!
See her like never before with a special new song! Come and show your support!
desc.zh_cn:
欢迎虚拟歌手初音{cf未来}莅临奇普托斯！
除了魅力四射的新歌以外，{cl初音}还特地为这次的现场演唱会准备了一具现实躯体，因此希望各位都能为她卖力应援、打气！

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.jp: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?
desc.zh_cn: 由于某天旧校舍突然涌出的温泉，{cn227号特别班}开始经营温泉浴场。面对来访学生们接连引起的混乱，究竟{cf和香}他们能否顺利地经营温泉浴场呢！？

name.en: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!
name.jp: Hot Springs Resort No. 227 Daily Logs!

desc.en: Spec Ops No. 227 find themselves operating a resort when a hot spring is discovered at the Former Institute. Will Nodoka and friends manage to operate the resort despite the constant hurdles and distractions?

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.zh_cn: 狐坂{cf若藻}的沉默与祝宴

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?

{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

name.en: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.jp: The Clumsy Sister and the Magician of the Old Library
name.zh_cn: 冒失修女和古书馆的魔术师

desc.en:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.jp:
An important event with the Sisterhood's reputation at stake!
But things begin to go awry from the get-go...
desc.zh_cn: {sn三一}重要的经典变得四分五裂了！为了复原经典，{cf日向}与老师在{sn三一}各处东奔西跑。究竟能不能在典礼开始前完成复原呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?

name.en: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.jp: Business Trip! Momoyodou Beach Shack Franchise Plan
name.zh_cn: 出差！百夜堂大海之家加盟计划

desc.en: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.jp: Members of Momoyodou visit the summer beach for a new business venture. However, they realize they got scammed in an insidious scheme! Shizuko declares that she will not go down like this and a new Momoyodou battle begins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟{cf静子}能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

name.en: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.jp: Get Set, Go! Kivotos Halo Festival!
name.zh_cn: Get Set, Go!　～奇普托斯晄轮大祭～

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战

desc.en: The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest begins. The non-stop battle against the Dimension Engine and its guardians doesn't let up for even a moment... But when the dust settles after the fight, what will await the students?
desc.jp: The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest begins. The non-stop battle against the Dimension Engine and its guardians doesn't let up for even a moment... But when the dust settles after the fight, what will await the students?
desc.zh_cn: 成功突入方舟后，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」正式开始。与次元引擎及其守护者展开的激战──究竟，在这场战斗的尽头等待着的会是什么呢……？

name.zh_cn: 阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战

desc.en: The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest begins. The non-stop battle against the Dimension Engine and its guardians doesn't let up for even a moment... But when the dust settles after the fight, what will await the students?
desc.jp: The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest begins. The non-stop battle against the Dimension Engine and its guardians doesn't let up for even a moment... But when the dust settles after the fight, what will await the students?
desc.zh_cn: 成功突入方舟后，「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」正式开始。与次元引擎及其守护者展开的激战──究竟，在这场战斗的尽头等待着的会是什么呢……？

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}在游戏中心收到了「打扫」的委托。委托人将{cf桃井}误认为{cnC&C}的{cf宁瑠}──没注意到这点就接下委托的{cf桃井}和{cn游戏开发部}一行人决定换上女仆装扮演{cnC&C}。究竟一行人能否顺利达成委托呢？

name.en: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.jp: Alabaster Calling Card ~Mansion Masquerade and the Essence of Beauty~
name.zh_cn: 纯白的预告信～虚饰之馆与美学所在之处～

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.zh_cn:
重视传统的{cn玄龙门}与尊崇进化的{cn玄武商会}。
彼此相反的{sn山海经}两大派系维持着危险的平衡。
某天，{cn玄武商会}被加诸了莫须有的怀疑──
究竟一行人能否克服这个危机呢？

name.en: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.jp: Dragon & Tortoise, Working Together for a Better Future
name.zh_cn: 龙武同舟～心中描绘的，是同一个{cf未来}～

desc.en: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?
desc.jp: A precarious balance had existed between the Black Tortoise Promenade and Genryumon in Shanhaijing when an incident throws that balance awry.... Will Sensei and the students be able to prevent the situation from plunging into chaos?

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!

name.en: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.jp: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.zh_cn: 漫画同人物语～2人所追求的最终回～

desc.en: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.jp: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.zh_cn:
将{cn知识解放战线}推向崩溃的悲剧名作《LUNA》。为了与{cf红叶}和解，也为了{cn知识解放战线}的重新团结，爱瑠打算完成未完的《LUNA》……
究竟在同人之路的前方等待着的会是什么样的结局呢！？

name.en: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.jp: Academy Club Story: A Pair's Final Adventure
name.zh_cn: 漫画同人物语～2人所追求的最终回～

desc.en: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.jp: The unfinished masterpiece, Luna, brought the Knowledge Liberation Front to ruin. In order to reconcile with Momiji and reunite the Knowledge Liberation Front, Meru must complete the unfinished Luna... What kind of ending lies ahead?!
desc.zh_cn:
将{cn知识解放战线}推向崩溃的悲剧名作《LUNA》。为了与{cf红叶}和解，也为了{cn知识解放战线}的重新团结，爱瑠打算完成未完的《LUNA》……
究竟在同人之路的前方等待着的会是什么样的结局呢！？

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有{sn格黑娜}的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回{sn三一}吗？

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!

在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。
匆忙搭上列车后，发现上头竟然有{sn格黑娜}的通缉犯──！？
究竟，大家能平安地将文物带回{sn三一}吗？

desc.en: Preparations for the total assault on the six Sanctums is complete. The countdown has begun, and the Allied Operation is about to begin, with the fate of all of Kivotos at stake...
desc.jp: Preparations for the total assault on the six Sanctums is complete. The countdown has begun, and the Allied Operation is about to begin, with the fate of all of Kivotos at stake...
desc.zh_cn: 总攻击的准备已经就绪。攸关奇普托斯命运的联合作战，即将开幕。

desc.en: Preparations for the total assault on the six Sanctums is complete. The countdown has begun, and the Allied Operation is about to begin, with the fate of all of Kivotos at stake...
desc.jp: Preparations for the total assault on the six Sanctums is complete. The countdown has begun, and the Allied Operation is about to begin, with the fate of all of Kivotos at stake...
desc.zh_cn: 总攻击的准备已经就绪。攸关奇普托斯命运的联合作战，即将开幕。

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.zh_cn: 结束「阿特拉哈西斯的方舟占领战」后，老师顺利与{cf白子}会合。接着只剩下回到地面了──然而并非如此。在老师的面前，展现不同姿态的{cf白子}与色彩的向导者出现了。究竟，他们能否平安回到地上呢？

desc.en: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...
desc.jp: It's time for the final battle against Phrenapates. To defeat the enemy and escape the Ark, everyone must join forces. And the truth that will be revealed at the end of it all is...

desc.en: This page displays all the related content with the event "Happy Valentine's Relationship Stories ♥"
desc.jp: This page displays all the related content with the event "Happy Valentine's Relationship Stories ♥"
